name: SeRVer Bot
short_description: SeRVer Bot is a opensource application designed to manage and monitor multiple servers from a single program. It is based on a client-server architecture. Server Bot application can be installed on any Linux distribution that has a GUI environment installed. Server Bot is validated on Red Hat Enterprise Linux, Fedora, Slackware 13 and above, Debian, Ubuntu, Linux Mint and all the other major Linux distribution on which MegaCli and ipmitools can be installed. It is a simple tool which parse all the information from your host server and present it all in one place, in a readable format.
summary: SeRVer Bot is an application designed to manage and monitor servers.
